desc: ASP.NET Web API is a key part of ASP.NET MVC 4 and the platform of choice for building RESTful services that can be accessed by a wide range of devices. Everything from JavaScript libraries to RIA plugins, RFID readers to smart phones can consume your services using platform-agnostic HTTP.
title: Pro ASP.NET Web API Security: Securing ASP.NET Web API (Expertâ€™s Voice in .NET)
